components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Message Delivery Delays to Econet Network in Zimbabwe

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Econet network in Zimbabwe. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Econet network in Zimbabwe. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Verification Errors for German Customers During Signup

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Console sign up. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 18 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: New Zealand SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 18 July 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from New Zealand handsets via a subset of Shortcode.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 19 July 2023 at 4:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US and Canada handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 19 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 20 July 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 20 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT.During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from France Bouygues Telecom handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 17:30 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of United Kingdom phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany and Austria Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and Austria is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 17:30 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Germany and Austria phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from France handsets.

The Legos network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 23:00 PDT.  During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Legos France handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 26 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 27 July 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Deutsche Telekom

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Deutsche Telekom is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 July 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 27 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Deutsche Telekom customers.

Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures to and from Twilio Japan phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 01 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
07 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 07 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
08 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 08 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
22 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
29 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 29 August 2023 at 14:00 PDT
11 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2023 at 16:30 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.
